participant_1.background:
I have a computer that is small enough for me to use comfortably, and it has all the features I need to design and create my own unique French fry creations.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
my wife stays home with our kids.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
Social media is not my thing.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are the ones that allow me to share my opinions and connect with people who share my interests.
I'm happily married to the love of my life.
i am well built and tall.
i love the chainsmokers.
I met my family through the military.

content.text: Hi there. How is your day going?
It's going well, thank you! I'm excited to be talking to you today.
Oh, good! I'm excited to be talking to you too. What are some of your interests?
I love music, especially the Chainsmokers. I also love to read and write.
Nice! I love the Chainsmokers too. I'm more of a reader than a writer, but I do enjoy writing sometimes.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I mostly read fiction. I love historical fiction, fantasy, and sci-fi.
Oh, cool! I like historical fiction too. I also like to read biographies and memoirs.
I've never really read a memoir, but I've heard good things about them.
They're really interesting! I love learning about other people's lives.
Me too! I think that's why I like historical fiction so much. It's like I'm learning about the past.
Exactly! I love that feeling of being transported to another time and place.
Me too! It's so much fun.
I'm glad we're on the same page about books.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
